de: Direkter Blick auf das Meer. Komplett renoviertes Hotel-Restaurant-Bar. Solarium. Kostenloser Parkplatz. Casino Tranchant in 250 m Entfernung. Meereskuren in 200 m Entfernung. Minigolf in 50 m Entfernung.

it: Vista diretta sul mare. Hotel-Ristorante-Bar completamente rinnovato. Solarium. Parcheggio gratuito. Casino Tranchant a 250 m. La marina polimerizza a 200 m. Mini-golf a 50 m.

de: Direkter Blick auf das Meer. Komplett renoviertes Hotel-Restaurant-Bar. Solarium. Kostenloser Parkplatz. Casino Tranchant in 250 m Entfernung. Meereskuren in 200 m Entfernung. Minigolf in 50 m Entfernung.
en:
Description of the measures put in place for the protection of visitors
Compliance with the standards and directives in force dictated by the institutions
Provision of hydroalcoholic gel for clients. Establishment of a specific protocol for the disinfection and the handing-over of the keys of the room under pocket

Direct view on the sea. Hotel-Restaurant-Bar completely renovated. Solarium. Free parking. Casino Tranchant at 250 m. Sea cures at 200 m. Mini-golf at 50 m.
